title: Hanes Men's Max Cushion Crew Socks, 6-Pack
description: DOUBLE TOUGH, WE MEAN IT - Reinforced heel and toe construction is designed to last and last.
CUSHIONED COMFORT - Extra cushioning puts softness into every step.
KEEP YOUR COOL - Cool Comfort fabric wicks away moisture so feet stay cool and dry all day.
BYE, BYE STINKY FEET - FreshIQ advanced odor-fighting technology attacks odor-causing bacteria to keep feet smelling fresh.
COMFORT IN EVERY DETAIL - A comfort top, extra stretch in the legs, and smooth toe seams for even more comfort.
TIME TO STOCK UP - Fill your sock drawer so you'll always have a fresh pair of men's crew socks on hand.

For sports or everyday wear, you'll appreciate the comfort and construction of Hanes® Max Cushion crew socks. These soft but Double Tough classic crew socks are made to last with a reinforced heel and toe, all the while cradling your foot with extra cushioning you'll feel with every step. These basic crew socks for men are made with Hanes' high-tech features, including Cool Comfort® fabric that wicks away moisture to keep feet cool and dry, and FreshIQ™ advanced odor-fighting technology that attacks odor-causing bacteria to keep feet smelling fresh. Smooth toe seams enhance comfort even more, and a touch of spandex in the fiber blend assures a stay-in-place fit. Stock up on these made-to-last crew socks and fill your sock drawer with comfort.
